problem_text_cn: 如图,l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},直线a,b与l_{1}、l_{2}、l_{3}分别相交于A、B、C和点D、E、F．若\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},DE=4,则EF的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, l_{N_0}∥l_{N_1}∥l_{N_2}, straight lines a, b and l_{N_3}、l_{N_4}、l_{N_5} intersect at points A, B, C and points D, E, and F respectively. If \frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{N_6}{N_7},DE=N_8, then the length of EF is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查平行线分线段成比例,掌握平行线分线段所得线段对应成比例是解题的关键．
